channel.title: Positions open in my server! (Admin, mod, etc)
channel.description:
Ok, I see alot of people posted on here, and I'm proud to say i've found a co-owner! His name on my server is snebulan. Even though this thread is closed to people wanting to be co-owner, you can still apply to be an admin or mod. :)
There is...One more position open. I need police. I know, sounds funny, but it's actually a quite serious matter. It's just a person who plays my server, but keeps a lookout for people using abusive language, mass clicking..etc etc. You will recieve clothing that you cannot buy in my server, or even get as a drop. This is a very special and serious position, so I will not accept you right away. Thanks.
Server Ip- 5.82.230.211 FunniScape.no-ip.info (Usually down)
Hamachi- FunniScape Password- 123

item.title: Positions open in my server! (Admin, mod, etc)
item.dc:creator: @Miss_Doctor Miss_Doctor
item.description:
@Miss_Doctor wrote:

Jensie, what I mean is that I have a server, and I need a coder to ADD more stuff and features onto it. And change stuff. Lol. And anyway, please dont post here if you’re not interested.

Lasermouse - If you want to talk log in to my server. Mk? AND I CANT BELIEVE YOU GOT THE LAST QUESTION WRONG! Cows are white AND black. Omg :l

And nacnac…hey. You never talk to me anymore. Shrugs Log in k? I had to fix a few things, but yeah.
